channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Markets are finely poised between a bullish breakout and bearish breakdown, says Bank of America strategist.
item.description: This market is poised for a breakout that could swing either in favor of the bulls or the bears, says Bank of America’s Michael Hartnett.

item.title: ‘The situation is extreme’: I’m 65 and leaving my estate to only one grandchild. Can the others contest my will?
item.description: “I feel it is absolutely necessary to leave about 90% of what I have to just one grandchild.”

item.title: Consumer spending softened as tariffs kicked in. Anxious Americans saved more in April.
item.description: Households boosted spending in March, especially on cars, to avoid tariff-related price increases. They cut back last month as the tariffs started to ...

item.title: Airbnb’s stock is now a sell, as a subdued summer for leisure travel looms, analyst says
item.description: Analysts cut price targets across the U.S. hotel sector as expectations dip on wavering consumer confidence and a drop in inbound international travel...

item.title: Is Trump’s trade strategy in limbo? Yes, but ‘Tariff Man’ has options.
item.description: Trump’s tariff playbook may be getting rewritten by the courts, but the era of low U.S. tariffs is over.

item.title: Ron Insana: Private credit industry poses a familiar risk as investors chase returns
item.description: Investors seeking returns in the private credit world shouldn’t overlook the risks that may arise in an economic downturn, Ron Insana warns.

item.title: JPMorgan says this pure play water stock is cheap and can jump nearly 20%
item.description: JPMorgan believes the stock is a strong play for investors wanting to invest directly into water technology.

item.title: Deutsche Bank says take chance on beaten-up UnitedHealth because of valuation
item.description: The firm's target price reflects a target multiple that sits at the low end of the stock's 10-year trading range.

item.title: UBS says this solar stock can rally 75% even as U.S. budget bill poses risks to clean energy
item.description: Sunrun shares have plunged in value, losing nearly 26% this year and more than 52% over the past year.

item.title: Evercore ISI hikes Netflix price target, says stock can march to new heights thanks to live events
item.description: Analyst Mark Mahaney maintained his outperform rating on the streaming giant and raised his price target by $200.
